(A few notes to all the RPers, I'v enoticed, since I first joined when Bio 
was in charge, that some of you type or misspell a few words wrong.  Here is 
what I've noticed:

Auto-bots
Arch

Now, the correct way for these follow:

Predacons
Maximals
Ark (crappy name for an Autobot ship)
Autobots
Decepticons
Quintessons
Vok

(CR chambers I'm not 100% sure on, so don't quote me)
But I'm not sure if something happened, but the Predacons seemed to use CR 
pools, not chambers.  Just wanted to point that out.  

---------------========================----------------------

Nemesis Enforcer/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror:


::Nemesis Enforcer checked his scanners, then looked to DeathStorm::
"The three Predacons are merely a dozen yards from our present location, 
proceed with extreme caution."

===========

::Double Punch slowly reached a CR pool, collapsing on the metallic surface 
of the pool, which slowly slid down, Double Punch quickly consumed by a 
silvery liquid::

::Injector opened up a CR chamber, taking a sit in it, the chamber closing, 
repairs beginning immediately::

::Manterror laughed, seeing Mantella asleep in a CR chamber::
"Defenseless and sessile, how intriguing!  No one defeats the Manterror!"
::Manterror put his weapons against the 'glass' of the chamber, aiming them 
at Mantella's head, firing two ion disks at Mantella's face, then stepping 
back a few feet, firing off two more ion disks at her abdomen, getting into a 
pool and beginning repairs::
